name: Lisa's choice
review: I use this before make.  Works her well to help foundation look better and stay on longer.

name: TOLeary
review: The best primer to wear under make-up if you have oily skin. Doesn't break-out sensitive skin, and looks very natural.

name: Jers
review: I use it with & without foundation. It's a great product to smooth the skin!

name: foxy-great-gram
review:
Use it under liquid foundation. Does a great job minimizing most flaws on my face. Save the job of adding other products to do that.
Have not found any other product to compare with this. Have fair, sensitive skin. No redness or sensitivity... Also no fragrance as I must have.

name: wheelchere
review: It didnt work will priming at all and it smelled horrid

name: KR
review: I am 64 years old and I can use this product without foundation. It smooths my skin, covers pores, and helps even out my skin color.

name: Blondiex1476
review: This primer is amazing I have very sensitive skin so many products make me breakout.  Very smooth consistency and is not thick on skin. Only con is once product gets low it's difficult to get it out.

name: VioletFire
review: It's just not that great.  It's a primer, it didn't make me break out and it didn't alter the color or texture of my makeup - that is pretty much the extent of its virtue.  It didn't make my makeup stay any longer than usual.  I have large pores, so I wasn't expecting miracles, but I noticed no difference with this primer.  I have combo skin, so try to keep things on the matte side, but I was shiny in a couple hours after applying.  Really nothing special.

name: Lakyn
review: This works better than Smashbox primer! Never have I gotten so many compliments on how great and matte my makeup looks! Love love loveeee!

name: TLayne
review: I'm 63 years old and have deep wrinkles, large pores,  sensitive, combination skin.  I've tried almost every primer available and some were very expensive.  Nothing is going to take my wrinkles and pores away; was just looking for something to minimize and smooth.  This was the product for me.  Although I don't wear makeup daily, I do use this on a daily basis. I rarely post anything about a product, but this was worth the time.

name: Lori
review: A little goes a long way!

name: Urban decay girl
review: This is my new favorite primer!

name: Kat
review: I read a lot of good reviews on this stuff so I thought I would give it a try. I use it under my tarte amazonian clay liquid foundation. I bought both at the same time and I thought I was unhappy with the tarte, but after cutting out this primer I realize that it was the problem. Made my foundation not cover well and almost made it seem too thick. The only pro to this product was that it made my foundation stay all day, however it didn't look the greatest. Definitely going to look for a better primer.

name: BeautyKat
review: This primer was easy to apply and goes on pretty smooth. I have oily skin and overall it does a good job on mattifying my skin. However, I do need to touch up with powder towards the end of the day and much sooner on more humid/hotter summer days. My biggest problem with this primer is that it makes blending concealer on areas around my nose and lips more difficult. The look is not is not as seamless and the concealer tends to build up around those dry areas.

name: lesleyal
review: I bought this primer because I read A review of an Ulta employee that said it was comparable to the Smashbox primer. Biggest lie ever! This product is so water based and it smells so bad. To top it off it sucks at being a primer. Dont waste your money on this

name: lesleyal
review: I bought this product because I read that it was comparable to the Smashbox Primer that I use. Lies!It so liquidy and it felt like i was putting water on my face. Im returning it ASAP.This product was gross.

name: Grannylady
review: Doesn't feel heavy or goopy, used it with powders and cream/liquid based foundations.

name: Umma
review: It does help makeup last all day, but it dries quickly and makes application of liquid foundation a little tricky since it doesn't glide smoothly over the primer.  But I would still recommend it because of how well the makeup stays.

name: Tilly
review: I used under my foundation and it made my face to white and chalky. Even under my foundation.. For fair skinned people

name: catie96
review: I love how smooth it makes my face feel, It truly holds to what it says it does, my favorite primer!

name: TM
review: When i bought this i thought it would be nice to use under my cover up.  I used it for a couple of days and it was ok, i didnt see much of a difference and then after the couple days i put it on and noticed when i let it sit without putting make up on i had white clumps on my face, almost like i wiped my face with toilet paper.

name: Swirlz
review: I was desperately looking for this and finally found it and Im in love with it. I love the pump. It makes my skin feel so smooth, much better then my LG Spackle. It makes my makeup last all day

name: Lisa
review: Use underneath makeup even in light looks beautiful...

name: Miss Vicki
review: I was looking for a less-expensive alternative to my usual primer so I gave this a go. However, I found this too lightweight and it seemed more like a face lotion than a primer. My face also felt more oily than ususal midday. I ended up returning it and going back to my normal brand.

name: SunnySideMuah
review:
this is product is not even close to a PRIMER!!
more like a sticky glue stuff on ur face.
I hate it!!!
Taking it back

name: BREE
review: i tried this product along with SEVERAL different foundations on a quest for the perfect combination.  I found with foundation it tended to make the foundation slide on the oily areas of my face.  That being said if you wear this out with powder (or just as is) it works really well in making your skin look more matte and smooth.

name: Annabelle
review: This has good coverage on little imperfections as well as hiding pores. However, it lacks glow, because it has a very dull appearance, maybe a overly powdered look. I will use it again, but only for everyday at home, and not for special occasions. Will refer it to friends, but with info on my personal experience with it.

name: Brooke
review:
This product broke me out, BUT I have very sensitive skin. Application and final look, I liked as much or better than Smashbox's primer. No pores all day!! Less shiny for much longer! (I only powder my face after using this.) It only comes in one color, but it did not seem to leave any white (I am pretty fair though, but I do try to look for that!!).
If you don't tend to break out from products, GET THIS, I'm so mad it broke me out!! If you do break out sometimes, I mean, this wasn't a huge breakout, I've had much worse, so I guess if you're daring?

name: Dale
review: This is my first and only primer. Ive never used anything but this. I really like it. It makes my face feel like silk and keeps my make-up on all day.

name: Stacy
review: I picked this product up in a drugstore since I was out of my go-to primer and while it is fine if you will only be wearing foundation for a few hours for going out at night, it does not last much longer than that, it tends to smear even a very light foundation application. It has the consistency of a serum/light lotion, and I prefer a primer with more of a clay consistency. I will finish the product, though will not buy again.

name: Munchkin011
review: I have insanely dry/oily skin and all I have to do is exfoliate, add a moisturizer to my skin, and throw this on! It stays on whether I am sweating, or not, looks great all day! Keeps oiliness way down and I can wear it with or without makeup!

name: Namana
review:
I have recently been really into primers, and have been trying so many that I am quickly becoming a hoarder.
This was a disappointment though. It is rather thick and pasty, and can cake up in some areas when you apply foundation on top. I wish it was a little thinner.
I will wear this day-to-day, but for the price and for the fact that this is a Revlon product, I'm pretty disappointed. Just glad I picked it up on sale.

name: Nitro Harley
review: Works good for everydayv use.

name: Brit
review: Do not buy, doesn't help.

name: LadyInRed
review: This primer is really good, ESPECIALLY if your looking for an inexpensive backup for Smashbox primer. Helps foundation last all day, is grease-less and light. I chose the one without color. If you have big pores, this might not give you the coverage you want - but it all depends on what you want from a primer.

name: Kate
review: If you are only planning on using this product to reduce shine and matte the skin, it will work just fine. Once you start trying to put anything on top of it, however, you will begin to have issues. I have owned 5 different primers so far (Smashbox and pores no more are my favorites) and this one was the worst once I tried to put makeup on. It will prevent the makeup from blending in to the skin, and it is supposed to help makeup blend in. It did very little to extend staying power. I can only really use it if I don't actually want to use makeup and I just want my skin to be more matte.

name: EverlyAnn
review: I tried to like this but I couldnt, i have t zone skine and this product left my skin oily really soon after applying, i didnt apply a lot either. Maybe is the weather that melts the product, who knows but i will not repurchase again.

name: Lindsey
review: The overall primer was okay and worked but if just used alone it tended to flake off a bit.

name: Vanna
review: This primer is better then Philosophy & I'd just like the NARS primer, I LOVE it. I put it on half of the top of my head and showed my bf, he was amazed at what it did. It's instantly mattifies the skin.

name: millipea
review:
I was skeptical of all primers, but I settled on trying a budget friendly option before tackling any expensive brands.

First, Let me divulge what kind of skin I am wearing. I am very oily in the T-zone area and usually drier on the rest of my face. My skin ranges from fair to medium and is yellow based. I work in an office setting with stagnant/poor air quality which gets the oil on my face producing faster and my makeup just fades away. I break out from stress and makeup just makes it worse.

This primer has canged my routine! After rinshing and drying my face in the morning I smooth a very small amount over my face (not even a full pump), eye lids and neck. A small amount goes a long way! The primer creates a smooth layer over your skin much like an invisible film for smoother application of makeup products. The primer makes cover ups for blemishes and acne easier too as the makeup settles on the primer and doesn't get absorbed into the acne.

I still do get a little oily, but that is normal because you still have the same skin you were born with. But the oiliness is more even and instead looks like a light dew. I definitely don't mind this! If I were to go out in the evening though I would definitely rewash my face and reapply the primer and my makeup.

Less definitely is more with this primer!

name: caroline
review: I have oily skin and this primer is a great base for my make up and it doesn't even make me break out!

name: Sheri
review: I like this primer, it goes on very silky and smooth.

name: Amy
review: No matter what foundation I use this underneath it keeps my face looking fresh. It's really lightweight and makes my face super soft. I love it!

name: Student
review: I use it every day. It goes on smooth and stays all day.

name: Just wants my  makeup to last
review: While this had helped moisturize my dry skin, I don't see it making my makeup last longer at all.  I am not sure about whether it helps your skin look better or not in pictures.  I would NOT use this if your skin is oily or "normal" as it would probably cause breakouts.  But like I said, it has helped moisturize my dry skin

name: pEI
review: This product does help foundation to stay fresh looking longer.  It doesn't "slide" on like other primers I have used.

name: Trevor
review: It's a very nice primer, it's a little bit sticky when you first apply it, (but that's a good thing because it gives you're foundation something too really cling to so it can last all day.) I have normal skin, so I can't really say how it works on dry/oily types, but it worked for me.

name: KaylaAnn
review: I purchased this after I ran out of another primer because I'd heard good things, but I simply wasn't impressed. It highlighted imperfections as well as made my skin look dry and flaky. The coverage was very thick and my foundation seemed to just sit on top. It might be just my preference for natural looking make-up and the "no make-up" look, but I felt like my face looked cake-y. Wish it worked better!

name: linda
review: every morning

name: Alison
review: Very easy to apply and smooth under makeup

name: cindy
review: Love it!

name: kasia
review: great covearage

name: Catkin
review: Not as smooth as Studio Gear primer, but works well for the price.

name: Tasha
review: This is supposed to minimize the appearance of pores. I did not notice any difference.

name: Jefe 209
review: goes on smoothly and does a great job for liquid makeup.  i suggest using with liquid as makeup as i have tried it with mineral and it doesn't feel as smooth. BUT it does make my liquid makeup go on smoothly and last ALL day long from 6am to 9pm.  and it looks GREAT the whole time.

name: Hannah
review: I really like this primer. it goes on really well, and stays put under makeup. it doesnt really have much of a smell, and it keeps me from getting greasy. also it does not break me out, and it makes my makeup stay on alot longer, and look a WHOLE LOT better. it also makes makeup go on alot smoother, and it makes my pores look smaller.

name: Aberantt
review: This is hands down the BEST primer I have ever used! I never could understand the big fuss about primer because I never could tell the difference when I had one on verses when I didn't UNTIL I tried this! This stuff is golden! As soon as I put it on my skin looked noticeably smoother. Worth every penny!

name: Bayougirl
review: Wanted to try a new primer and decide to try this one. Was skeptical but I'm glad I decided to try it. I absolutely love it! Will continue to buy it. I loved it so much I went bk and got the Revlon Photo Ready Foundation. I really love it as well!

name: Amazontammie
review: I use it under makeup

name: Meg
review: It felt thick and not as smooth as other primers I have used. It left my face feeling sticky.

name: Bella
review: Tried lots of primers, expensive and cheap. Best I've ever found. Can use without makeup on top. Matify face and covers flawlessly.

name: Missy
review: This primer makes my face look like I used way too much powder.  My foundation does not go on smoothly with this the way it does with other primers I have used, I need to blend and blend and then retouch with a sponge to make it look natural.

name: Becks
review: I've been to the moon and back searching for a good primer, loved Tarte for a long time but needed a change, had no luck and tried a lot of high end and expensive ones.  Took a shot in the dark and grabbed it at the grocery store the other day and I love it. great application and smoothness and helps my make-up look smooth and stay on while my skin looks smoother

name: cms
review: the texture of the product is nice but the smell was too strong for me to use and it does not go away

name: DH
review: The product is great but you have to get the bottle open in order to get the last half out!

name: Emily
review: For the money, this primer cannot be beat. I think, as a primer its comparable to SmashBox or Laura Mercier. I do notice it leaves a *very* matte finish if worn alone...but I never do that. I really love it under Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer or the new Benefit Oxygen Wow foundation. Really helps both lightweight options last, yet doesn't defeat the pleasure of their weight.

name: hibirrd
review: I needed something lightweight to try instead of bare minerals foundation.  This is wonderful.

name: Tee C.
review: I was originally going to buy a smashbox primer but I heard some decent reviews on this revlon primer so I decided I'd try it out before I splurged on a $36 primer. I found that it was very easy to apply.. After applying my moisturizer, I use my hands to apply it onto my face the same way I do my moisturizer.. It feels very soft and light & my makeup applies smoothly over it. I wouldn't recommend using it alone, especially not for medium skin tones like mine because it looks a little light & chalky alone, but it's great for under makeup.  The only problem I have is that my eyeliner & eyeshadow tend to smear more..

name: Kat
review: I used this primer for 6 days and thought it was awesome.  By the end of the 6th day, I had developed a rash, not pimples, but little red bumps all over my face.  I have pretty sensitive skin, so I'm disappointed, but not entirely surprised.  The primer really smoothed the appearance of pores and reduced oily shine.  I also use the Photo Ready foundation and they work great together.  I have no rash problem with the foundation.

name: Raleena
review: Very smooth and creamy, helps keep foundation in place all day long.

name: Mid-30's modern woman
review: I have always used Smashbox primer, but wanted to try something different and less expensive.  This is not the primer for me - it is too thick and feels like heavy-duty sunscreen.  I am going back to Smashbox.

name: Pamacita
review: makes make up/ foundation go on a lot smoother

name: Carol
review: Really helps my make up stay on longer.

name: crystalc
review: I bought this for a wedding I was in.  Tried the product two days before to make sure I liked it.  Felt really nasty. It made my face feel tight. Smelled bad.  Made my face red, washed it off after an hour.  I used my friends Bare minerals primer for the wedding.  Worked great!  You get what you pay for.

name: Laura
review:
love this product...will recommend this to anyone
very versatile

name: Nazygurl
review: I love this primer. It makes my skin so soft and it has helped decrease my break outs. I am a dancer and I can't imagine the stress my face would have gone through if I didn't put this on before my stage make up for shows.

name: J
review: Bought this because I wanted to start using primers with my makeup and this was the first one I found. I've used it a few times with bb creams and foundations and it didn't make much of a difference. When I used it under my Revlon color stay for oily skin it actually made it look worse. Does smell like glue but it goes away once applied. It did feel nice and smooth on my skin and made it softer but as far as a difference in my makeup lasting, it did nothing.

name: Vin
review: under my makeup

name: Beach'n
review: Goes on well, smooth brightening color and works well as a primer. Is a bit "tacky" feeling all day.

name: Tesyy
review: Love it

name: Kim
review: Last for hours, but makes my foundation slide around. Not good for my oily skin, either. You can see where the oil comes out of my pores after a couple hours really easily. Might be good for dry skin.

name: Mama
review: Love this primer, the only bad thing is when almost gone I have to rip the lid off to use a q-tip to get the rest out. I wish it had a screw lid.

name: Kathy
review: On a clean face apply before your foundation

name: Peacelilly
review: I use this product over my moisturizer and under my foundation.  It makes my skin look very smooth, it stays on until I take it off and makes my foundation look good all day.  The price is reasonable so I have no complaints about this product.

name: Reyna
review: I use this product everyday and in fact, can't be without it. This primer is like starting with a clean smooth canvas before the art of make up. So light you wouldn't know it's there except that you can definitely see the difference. Makes my face look younger, fresher. Makeup adheres and lasts longer, and I find I need less makeup because of it. My only complaint is the pump bottle. I like the convenience of the pump. But, it would be better if the pump screwed off, otherwise the last third of the primer is impossible to get out. Great product.

name: Gina
review: I have used this product for years and love the results.  It keeps the shine off for hours.

name: devlebaba
review: I feel like I should love this but I don't. It feels so heavy under foundation, I've tried it many ways.. I've tried applying and letting it set for 10+ minutes or more and I've tried it by applying foundation directly afterwards.  I feel like it makes my non oily skin oily. I also don't feel like my foundation sticks to it and by the end of an 8 hour day I feel like I have lost most of my face because product comes off easily. I wouldn't even say I have large pores or anything to really want to blur. I don't suggest this to anyone with normal to dry skin like mine. It feels grainy and makes my face look dull and perhaps that's the point but for me it doesn't work and was a waste of my money.

name: Erica
review: Used before foundation this primer is amazing. I have oily skin and it has worked pretty well with me. Definitely would use again and again.

name: Erica
review: Used before foundation this primer is amazing. I have oily skin and it has worked pretty well with me. Definitely would use again and again.

name: ANC01
review: I love this primer.  I have oily/acne prone skin and I need mattifying primers.  Goes down super smoothly after moisturizer and immediately mattifies.  It is a bit thick but I don't feel it after i put foundation on.  Foundation also applies smoothly.  I don't think it has a pore-filling property but it does seem to blur pretty well.  After a 10 hour day my skin does still get oily and my nose after about half a day but that is impressive for my level of oily skin and I don't use a mattifying/setting powder on top of my foundation.

name: nikki
review: Use everyday with or without makeup.

name: pinehillgirl
review: This product is all right.  It does what it is supposed to do.  My problem is that the dispenser has quit working now that I am more than half way finished with the bottle.  I tried taking the top off without success.  It has become expensive since I cannot use so much of it.  Just be aware before you buy.

name: jmgroff
review: This by far is the best primer and I think I've tried them all.  I know smashbox is rated number one but I break out from that.  For the price you can't beat it.  This primer is the only one that makes my face look the smoothest prior to putting my makeup on.

name: Pat
review: I am not sure about when to use moisturizer........before after the primer is applied!

name: Mary
review: The primer goes on well and works great to give makeup smooth surface. However, the pump only works about halfway through the bottle and then will not pump the rest of product. I have to disassemble the pump from the bottle to pour and scrape the rest out of bottle.

name: kenny
review: Best primer and it's really cheap

name: Sheilasweets
review: I didn't see how it primed my skin you could still see my imperfections! Too lightweight for me, but I'm 44...

name: Dina
review: Received a recommendation from one of your employees.  This is the first time I'm using this product and love it!

name: HM
review: This is not a product for oily or combination skin. The primer slid right off my skin by the end of the day. It also has a very strong and unpleasant rubbery/chemical smell that makes it difficult to use.

name: Abigail's mom
review: Made my face less shiny, but still felt that pores were noticeable and my make-up in the T-zone was still the first area to wear off

name: Jen
review: I use this product every day as a base. My makeup lasts longer and stays fresh.

name: Karl
review: I usually buy this one or NYX Angel Veil

name: Addy Lee
review: Usually not too impressed with Revlon makeup, but I really like this primer! Although that could be because it's the first primer I've tried in a long time. I like that it's lightweight, and it doesn't dry out my skin. I get a smooth surface to work with when I start with my photoready perfecting primer!

name: Stefanie
review: This my second go to primer. I loooove the Smashbox photo-finish primer.. but when I don't want to use my beloved but pricey primer on those days when I'm just running errands and not going out or on a date this is the primer I use.  It's stayed on and worked well with every kind of brand of makeup I've used with it. (Revlon, Maybelline, Physicians Formula, Covergirl, etc.) Never has made me look to cakey which some primers can do... and keeps my face matte and not oily which is always a plus!

name: joanitavan
review: This primer definitely made my foundation go on smoother and last longer! Plus it does not break the bank.

name: LazyEyedRasputin
review:
The best primer I have ever used. EVER.
Smooth and easy to apply, Revlon's Photoready primer is my official queen of my beauty stash. When used in moderation (a little bit goes a long way!), it will not clog pores, cause breakouts, over dry, or cake up. However, because of it's mattifying effects, I highly recommend using a moisturizer first for those with sensitive or dry skin.
Worn below my foundation and powder, it provides me incredible wear for up to 18 hours, even in humid temperatures! It's incredible coverage fills in lines, wrinkles, pores, and more!
TIPS:
1. This shine-control formula can be drying to sensitive skin! Use a moisturizer first if you need!
2. A little goes a long way! Be sure to apply foundation immediately after to ensure optimum smoothness! Too much and you'll clump or clog your pores.
3. YES! It does work for eyelids! Just don't get it in your eyes!!!
4. Pop off the black lid with a screwdriver or spoon when the pump can no longer reach the remaining product. With a brush end or stick, you can scoop up the remaining with ease! Don't forget to put the cap on between uses to keep it from drying out!

name: Tiny
review: Product seem to work at first but as days went by my oily face looked oily everyday. I do not use a lot of make up and still the oil on my fore head and around my nose and on my chin.

name: Leigh
review:
Here are my specs: Half Caucasian and half Korean; my skin can't decide if it wants to be oily, dry, or normal; and my skin tone is medium with a bit of yellow. I work in front of a computer all day, right next to the front door of the building, so although I'm not getting sunshine I'm getting a constant draft from the people who walk in and out.

I hate to give this product two stars, as Revlon is one of the two drug store brands that actually works for me, but it did absolutely nothing for the makeup. For a few weeks I used it with Revlon Photoready foundation (liquid to powder) and the foundation not only didn't stay on for long, but my skin would get very oily. I tried it with another foundation (I forgot which one), and while my skin didn't get oily, the foundation wore off as though I wasn't using a primer.

This primer is intended for photographs, but I haven't had my picture taken while wearing it, so I added one star because I don't know how useful it is concerning portrait photography.
I would not recommend this product for daily use.

name: Emily
review:
I have fair skin, sensitive, and tends to be dry outside of my T-zone. I wear this product alone, with just a bit of blush and/or bronzer and I love the way it mattes my skin.

It looks like I have airbrushed foundation on! Totally evens out tone and color. I also don't like wearing any kind of full-coverage makeup so this is the perfect inbetween.

BUT don't wear too much, more than 1 pumps worth and it gets flaky and paper-y. I think it also helps to put on a good moisturizer first.

name: rhb123
review: I love the lasting effect for all day appplication.

name: Linda
review: I use this product under my makeup.  It does a very nice job.

name: Nanci
review: I use this over my moisturizer/sunscreen to give a smooth matte appearance before applying my foundation. Foundation goes on  and looks better. But the packaging/pump is terrible. About 1/2 to 2/3 through the pump does not work well at all. It takes a lot of shaking and rolling to get the pump to dispense the product and then it comes out in bits and spurts. I don't like waste and it takes a long time to get it to dispense or you have to break the top off. I hope they fix this.

name: Isuckatmakeup
review:
I have really oily skin.
I mean I shine like a disco ball type of skin.

And this product helped me manage it.
I use it under my makeup

name: Becksbuzz
review:
This product provides long lasting coverage for your next step(make up.) Its light weight and blends well.
There's higher priced for sure, but if you want a reasonable price and a good product give this a try.

name: teecie
review: i am dark skinned and on my complexion it dulled me out and gave my skin a gray tone. i only used it once. i did not like it.

name: Townie
review: good product and economically priced.  I am retired on a fixed income and this product fits into my budget.

name: Shell
review: Already loved the Photo Ready products and am just as pleased with this primer. Can't believe how smooth it makes my skin look. Was skeptical about using  primer, foundation and powder...worried it would be heavy. Felt very light. LOVE this!

name: Working momma on the go
review: Goes on smooth. Helps my foundation last all day. Makes my skin feel silky. Cheaper than other brands. Matches perfect with their brand foundation. I have sensitive skin and have broke out on my chin. Not sure if this is because other reasons but has been since I started wearing it.

name: Kate the Pale
review:
I use this every day that I wear makeup to prime my skin. One to one and a half squirts of this is plenty for me.
This is probably the single biggest change to my makeup routine I've made in a long time, and I'm so glad I made the plunge. As someone with oily skin, I can use all the help I can get to soak it all up and have a fresh base for applying makeup. This stuff, I assure you, does the job! I have no complaints about it, it's wonderful and WORKS.

name: Macy
review: I use the product everyday. Goes on smooth like a lotion without the shiny look, but still leaves a very natural look.

name: loverUNDfighter
review: I love this Revlon product. I previously paid three times the amount for the same thing from other companies and this works just as well. There are two shades. One that is lighter and the other has a slight pink tint for girls with natural coloring. I can wear it by itself as a light foundating or under a foundation for an air brushed look. It does a good job of flattering my tone and making my end result look natural.

name: topcat
review: Just Love it!  Please put it on sale and make coupons for it!

name: Coffeeandchi
review: I use this before applying the revlon foundation and I really like it. Keeps makeup on all day and there's no need for touch ups. :)

name: Mankey Doodle
review: I love that it is east to apply and covers well, it also smooths out my face so that makeup goes on smoothly.

name: A. E
review: I would give this primer 10 stars if I could. This is the first primer I have ever used and I LOVE IT. I have oily brown skin( I am from Brazil) and one thing I was always very disappointed about makeup is that it would ALWAYS melt on my eye lids withing less than 1 hour. I started using waterproof eye liner to try to have it last a little longer with not much success. So I decided to try a primer and I just didn't want to pay a lot for it and purchased the REVLON at a drugstore. WHAT A SUCCESS!!!! BINGO! My make up lasts over 12 hours a day. I am not kidding.I am not doing anything different except for using this primer on my face. After 12 hours my entire face looks just as good as when I first applied the makeup. I use the cheapest makeup form drugstores I can find and it will still be amazing after all day wearing it. I even use regular eyeliner and it will be just perfect! This product is very very light when you apply and makes my skin feel like silk. Just awesome!Thank you REVLON

name: CG
review: This product is great and has a great price.

name: Cam
review: I have been using this primer for years, and I love it. I use it everyday over my moisturizer, and it creates a smooth canvas to apply my makeup. It does not irritate my sensitive, acne-prone skin. Bonus is that Ulta frequently has it on sale. It is a cheaper dupe of Clarins primer (which I also love but it's expensive price tag makes it impractical for everyday use). Only 4 stars because it is difficult trying to get the last bit of primer out of the bottle.

name: KR
review: this caused my face to burn all day long

name: Anita
review: I use this under my foundation and find it helpful in providing smooth makeup coverage but was really annoyed half way through the product to find the pump style packaging did not reliably deliver product, which came out in sputters if at all. With one quarter of the product remaining, I had to remove the top entirely (ruining the bottle) to get at the product. So it is very wasteful - you don't get what you pay for without a lot of trouble.

name: Lady Di
review: I really like this primer. Another favourite to add to my collection.

name: Rachel
review: This primer smooths and perfects your skin by itself, while moisturizing and brightening your complexion! If you have oily skin (this may work with other skin types), mix it in with your foundation and your makeup will NOT get greasy and will last all day long. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because if you wear it by itself, it makes little visible clumps on your face.

name: Aurora
review: The primer is extremely oily, and me having oily skin, it didn't work very well. I broke out horribly, and red spots appeared all over my face. Primer is also very thick.

name: KR
review: The smell is ok I goes on well just prefer urban decay

name: Michelle
review: I use this primer every day and love it.  It's easy to appply and you don't have to use a lot of product to get coverage.  It goes on smooth, blends well and lasts all day.

name: Allergic Annie
review: Bought this because it was a top pic on Beautypedia and other reviews. Within a day I had a large red spot on my upper cheek area. So bright I couldn't cover with concealer. After 3 days more spots started appearing. Removed this product from my routine and it took 2 weeks for my skin to return to normal. Unsure what is in it that caused the problem but will be far more cautious with adding anything besides tarte, bare minerals or any natural oils to my routine. If you are prone to skin allergies use with caution.

name: Buffy
review: The product makes my makeup application go on smoothly and wears longer.

name: Anne the Animal Lover
review: like the price, just wish it was certified with the Leaping Bunny, trying to use all cruelty free products

name: mrmrm
review: Foundation goes on smoother when using this primer.  Small lines and visible pores are smoothed out.  You look younger!

name: Vicky
review:
Vanicream Moisture first. Sunscreen. Primer. Loreal lift makeup.
Would rather use Loreal primer.

name: Barb
review: This is a great primer, good price. I've tried several brands and this feels like a high end product.

name: stac
review: This is just as good as an expensive brand! It does a great job covering. Can use under or on top of makeup! Smooth silky feeling!

name: College mom
review: I read other reviews that said this was great. With three kids in college, my wallet could use a break, so I tried it. It really is lovely - and I'm a faithful user of premium products. This saved me money. It is a real beauty find. I'm in the over 50 set. Goes on over my moisturizer and under my foundation. Love it.

name: Reg
review: Just started using primers & again I go to drugstore brands only. Get the same results as expensive brands

name: Not a pro
review: Great product; however, the bottles in which it comes break easily.  Also, this is my 3rd bottle purchased and when the product if half to 2/3 used, you have to pry open the lid to use the remaining product in the bottle because it will not pump out of the bottle any longer.  I wish they would change the packaging!!!

name: Janelle
review: I really really like this primer! It feels more like a lotion but with primer results. Its not greasy like a lot of the other primers out there and little goes a long way!

name: Danah2012
review: Light on your face and make your completion look photo ready! Absolutely fantastic product

name: Lizardlover
review: I like this product as much as some of the expensive primers I have used in the past.

name: TJ
review: Used this only b/c the store was out of my fav  primer. It was a waste of money. It is flat, with a matte finish and it made the mineral powder I applied over it look dull. It also did not correct the ruddy areas on my cheeks. The product I normally use enhances other make-up that I wear on top of it, this one disappointed.

name: Moe
review: Went on smooth and gave me a matte finish, I wouldn't wear this without foundation though if you're around my skin tone or it'll look a little chalky.

name: mek8
review: I've tried many primers and decided to try this more cost effective primer. I didn't like it. It did help a little but it felt more or less like glue on your face and it clogged my pores. Take it from me spend a little more and get a better product.

name: Val
review: Good purchase

name: crystalc
review: Looks like glue on your face. Smells bad.  I had to wash it off.  Made my face feel tight... Not in a good way

name: CeCe
review: Evens out skin tone before applying foundation.  Works beautifully.  Very happy.

name: Jules5668
review: I have tried multiple primers, and typically steer clear of "drug store brand" products. I kept reading about this primer as the editor's choice in Allure, and finally decided to try it. I apply prior to applying foundation daily, and it provides a great coverage and prime for my make up throughout the day. I also have worn alone, and it gives just enough "perfecting" to wear.

name: Loving makeup
review: It's pretty good. I applied it on half my face when I first bought it just to see the difference and I have to say the half that I put the product on liked smooth out and had a lot of reduction in visible pores. For the price I would say its great

name: Taylor
review: The product itself was great! One of the best drug store primers I've used! But the glass bottle it is packaged in is really inconvenient. After you are unable to draw primer from the pump nozzle, there is no way to open up the bottle and get whatever product is left. A waste of product :(

name: Amber the make up artist.
review: I use this all over my face and eyelids before I use any make up. It feels smooth and natural can't even tell that it's on!

name: Samantha
review: Use it under my colorstay foundation.  Helps it even out texture and gives me the matte look!!!! Great price too! Better than the MAC primer and didn't make me break out for once!!!

name: Fireymom
review: Best primer you will ever use. A little goes a long way. It's super creamy, and goes on smooth.

name: T.M.
review: This primer helped my makeup stay on all day. I have combination skin and it helped me from becoming shiny.

name: Jen
review: It works better than any other primer I've tried.

name: karina
review: its smooth and makes makeup stay on and look great!

name: Amos
review: No comment

name: Vin
review: Its s great product

name: Sunny D
review: I use this product along and with face powders and creams

name: MarKay
review: not my favorite by far.  Prefer smashbox

name: Lasher
review: Nice, smooth easy to apply and a super bargain primer.

name: Miranda, F
review:
I love the Revlon PhotoReady Pore Reducing Primer!

It's easy to blend! It glides on smoothly and evenly!

It's a great way to highlight and get a luminous look on your cheeks!

It goes from and dries as a powder!

This post was sponsored by Revlon as part of a sampling activation for Crowdtap. I received complementary products to facilitate my review.

name: Queen E
review:
Best foundation ever...
I love the way it makes my skin feels when applying it to my face, And the way he keeps my make up on all day

name: jamie
review: this primer is a holy grail, i use the pore perfecting primer. if you have oily skin, and can never seem to keep your face from getting shiny after applying your face products, this works wonders. i don't say this lightly, at all! my skin will look like a greaseball two hours after applying the most mattifying product i can, but with this primer, i can go a whole 10 hour period with only getting a slight "glow" to my skin, which has never happened in my life. it gets rid of my pores and honestly i can't live without it!

name: Lupe
review: Only recently started using primer and didn't want to spend a lot because I already spend a lot on my foundation, setting powder, blush, etc.  I found d this worked very well.

name: T
review: Creamy, natural looking primer but about halfway down it stops pumping, wasting half the product.

name: Jen
review: I'm not exactly a makeup connoisseur, I just find something that works and stick to it and this product works. I need a primer that really smooths out my huge pores, and personally, I think this does just as good of a job as Benefit's Porefessional primer. I also like that this primer doesn't have that greasy feel like some primers do; it's a little tacky without being sticky.

name: Ulta4431
review: I typically use Urban Decay for all my makeup, but this primer is really good. Although it's hard to use it all when nothing comes out with a third of it left.

name: Sarah the inconsistent
review: I have really oily skin, so this product works great for me to make my skin look more matte. I think it also makes my skin look more even and clean, if I didn't have so much acne, I'd probably just use this alone for just going out to run errands or hanging out with friends. But as of now, it's a great primer. It gets a little dry sometimes, so there's some clumps. It is really drying to skin, so I always need to moisturize before I apply it.

name: Tiare
review:
I've tried finding a decent drugstore primer to replace my expensive MAC Prep + Prime and I've found it! This stuff works very well for normal to combo skin. If you have dry skin or even oily skin you might not like this.

The smell is ever so slightly off putting, but you can't detect it once it's on your face. The pump makes this so convenient and easy to use. I recommend rubbing together with your fingers and then patting this on your face, rather than SMEARING it on. The finish is much more natural. I will continue to repurchase this.

name: Nikki
review: Easy to apply, I love the way this feels on my skin!

name: NettieNita
review: I use this product with the Revlon Color Stay Whipped Crème Makeup. These two products together give me an awesome flawless look that last from morning to night. I look fabulous all day long!  Isn't that what every women wants that loves makeup?

name: Mm
review:
This is by far my favorite primer.it makes my makeup last all day,it smooths out my face and unlike other primers it doesn't my skin oily after a couple hours of wear. But this does have some cons. It does cause me to break out,not bad but more than I usually do. Second, it's not silicone based and reminds me of a paste and does feel a little heavy on the skin. After using this for a few days I have switch to a different primer because for some reason I can't understand it stops working effectively, after a couple of days I switch back to the revlon and I works beautifully. I' m puzzled why this happens.
But despite the cons it's still the primer I grab for and I will continue to use this. The cons are not bad enough for me to quit using it, it's just a little annoying.

name: beautyjunkie08
review: I really like this primer from Revlon. I was tired of shelling out lots of money for higher end primers so I decided to give this one a try. A big plus was the fact that it gives you a lot of product for less. It is velvety smooth, it dries to a matte finish, and diffuses any minor imperfections. I have very oily skin and I even like to wear this by itself when running errands. I like how it makes my foundation stay in place and I don't have to worry about touch ups.

name: Alison
review: Really great as an everyday primer. Apply gently or it may ball up

name: amuarox
review: i can say this can be a cheaper replacement to the porefessional same effecta t a cheaper price, you do want to measure how much you use, if you palce too much on your face you will begin to see a white powder finish on your face (im a medium beige color)

name: Tree
review: This product is average at best to me. I use it under my BB cream and it helps that to go on smoothly and gives me a nice finish but it does nothing to help control the oil on my nose. I think it works best for short-term makeup wear like going to run errands or something for only a few hours. I would not use this for extended wear such as going to work (7-8 hrs) or going out on weekends or special occasions when you want your makeup to look flawless all day long. If you tend to sweat, this product is not for you.

name: humblegirl
review:
A friend recommended this product after I complimented her on how great her complexion looked in the 100-degree temperatures we are experiencing right now.

I have paid 35+ dollars for other more expensive primers and don't see any difference...

name: PalaceWoman
review: This product is a real find! It makes my regular foundation so much more effective. My skin looks smoother, clearer and much brighter. I hope they never discontinue it, and I will try everything else in this Revlon Photo Ready line! Great stuff!

name: Heather
review: I liked using this primer. It gave the makeup an all over very nice smooth look

name: DreamerGirl
review: Makes skin so smooth and helped my makeup last for 14 hrs!

name: Sweetie57
review: This product I fell in love with. I have used a couple of top designer line foundation primers, and decided to try this one just for fun. And WOW, it's great!! Will continue to use this primer for a long time.

name: Martella
review: Apply first.It makes skin ready for foundation.

name: amber
review: this is a great primer. easy to blend. matte finish and feel. great with or without make up.

name: Madison
review: Light weight

name: Jules
review: I actually have makeup left at the end of the day with this product! Not at all greasy or thick and makes your make-up look much more flawless.

name: Grace
review: This stuff works great! It goes on easily, and you only need a little because it smooths over a lot of facial area. Love putting this on to prep my face for makeup!

name: Kandi
review: Love this product. Love how it seems to minimize my pores!

name: Britnymelinda22
review: I would give it five stars, but formula feels greasy while applying. Does what it is supposed to and so far has not caused any breakouts.

name: MJ
review: It really helps blend in the foundation for a better look

name: katrinafaye
review: made my skin dry out and my foundation flake.

name: Mom
review: I use this as a primer, or alone.

name: Georgetown lady
review: I use this product everyday under my makeup.  It makes my skin look great and helps to blend in my makeup.

name: moon122975
review: I love this primer, it controls shine and keeps my makeup looking fresh most of the day. I've seen horrible reviews and I just don't understand. It doesn't smell at all and if it feels sticky and heavy on your face you are probably using too much or you are putting make up on before the primer dries. I have severely oily skin and I'm 41 years old, this covered my fine lines and wrinkles. I use it alone and with foundation powder.

name: Bobbi the Baker
review: use when going out  or what to look nice with out being "Made up"

name: Diann
review: Great to help hold base on.

name: Kels
review: Good product

name: B
review: Absolutely love this! Better than any primer I've used!

name: Jojo
review: When I put this on it makes my skin feel so soft and magical. It feels like I'm putting on silk, and it has some pore filling qualities. I put this on a few minutes before I do my foundation, and my makeup stays on all day. Sometimes I do have excess oil show through, but my skin has always been oily so I do not think it is the fault of the primer. Overall I adore the creamy texture of this product, and definitely would recommend buying!
